member.name: M:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CodeGenerationAttribute.#ctor(System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CodeGenerationFlags)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Flags that specify how code is generated.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CodeGenerationAttribute.CodeGenerationFlags
member.summary: Gets the flags that specify how code is generated.
member.returns: The flags that specify how code is generated.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CodeGenerationFlags
member.summary: Defines flags that specify how code is generated.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CodeGenerationFlags.EnableFPIntrinsicsUsingSIMD
member.summary: Specifies that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler may use SIMD instructions for certain vector and matrix operations.

member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData
member.summary: Provides methods for encrypting and decrypting data. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the encrypted data.
member.returns: A byte array representing the encrypted data.
member.param: A byte array that contains data to encrypt.
An optional additional byte array used to increase the complexity of the encryption, or null for no additional complexity.
member.exception: The operating system does not support this method.
The system ran out of memory while encrypting the data.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts the data in a specified byte array and returns a byte array that contains the decrypted data.
member.returns: A byte array representing the decrypted data.
member.param: A byte array containing data encrypted using the method.
An optional additional byte array that was used to encrypt the data, or null if the additional byte array was not used.
member.exception: The operating system does not support this method.
